title: Publish package to npm registry
description: Publish the built package to npm registry using npm publish with proper authentication and version management

title: Configure package.json for npm publishing
description: Add required npm publishing fields to package.json including files, exports, types, and proper publishing configuration

title: Set up CI/CD for automated npm publishing
description: Set up GitHub Actions workflow to automatically build and publish new versions to npm when releases are created or tags are pushed

title: Fix: Floating point numbers not handled properly
description: terbilang(123.45) returns 'Seratus Dua Puluh Tiga' losing decimal part. Either validate integer input or support decimal conversion.
close_reason: Fixed: Added integer validation that throws error for non-integer inputs

title: Fix: Zero returns empty string instead of 'Nol'
description: terbilang(0) returns '' instead of 'Nol'. Add condition at line 18 to handle zero properly.
close_reason: Fixed: Added check for zero to return 'Nol'

title: Fix: Negative numbers return empty string without indication
description: terbilang(-5) returns '' same as zero. Should throw error or return 'Negatif ' + terbilang(Math.abs(num))
close_reason: Fixed: Negative numbers now return 'Negatif ' + terbilang(Math.abs(num))

title: Fix: Add integer validation at function entry
description: No validation for non-integer inputs. terbilang(3.5) would attempt bilangan[3.5] which returns undefined. Add integer validation at function start.
close_reason: Fixed: Integer validation added as part of terbilang-ts-ah9

title: Refactor: Simplify complex loop logic in terbilang
description: Lines 48-55 have complex loop logic that is hard to reason about. Refactor to use more explicit loop conditions or extract scale calculation to helper function.
close_reason: Refactored: Replaced complex loop logic with explicit scales array for better readability

title: Test package locally before publishing
description: Build and test the package locally using npm pack and npm link to ensure it installs and works correctly before publishing to registry

title: Fix: Numbers beyond Kuadriliun return empty string
description: Very large numbers fail silently instead of throwing error. Should throw error for numbers exceeding supported range.
close_reason: Fixed: Added validation to throw error for numbers >= 10^18

title: Set up build output configuration for npm
description: Configure Vite build to output proper npm package structure with dist directory, library mode, and TypeScript declaration files

title: Publish terbilang-ts to npm
description: Publish the terbilang-ts library as an npm package so it can be easily installed and used by other developers
